For in [93mvivo[0m [93mapplications[0m, [93mboth[0m [93mprokaryotic[0m and [93meukaryotic[0m [93mapplications[0m [93mwould[0m [93mrequire[0m the [93mpassage[0m of the [93mOM[0m [93mcatalyst[0m through the [93mcell[0m [93mmembrane[0m, which [93malready[0m [93mcontains[0m [93munsaturated[0m [93molefins[0m and [93mthus[0m [93mpotential[0m [93msubstrates[0m for [93mOM[0m. This [93mwork[0m [93mfocuses[0m on the [93mquestion[0m [93mwhether[0m [93mOM[0m is [93mcatalysed[0m in [93mmembranes[0m [93mcontaining[0m [93munsaturated[0m [93mphospholipids[0m. [93mInitial[0m [93mexperiments[0m with the [93m2nd[0m [93mgeneration[0m [93mHoveyda[0m-[93mGrubbs[0m [93mcatalyst[0m ([93mHGII[0m) [93mshowed[0m [93mself[0m-[93mmetathesis[0m of the [93mmembrane[0m-[93mforming[0m [93mphospholipids[0m [93mPOPE[0m, [93mPOPC[0m, and [93mPOPG[0m, while [93mapproximating[0m [93mbiological[0m [93mconditions[0m in [93msolution[0m ([93m37[0m °[93mC[0m, [93mair[0m, [93mneutral[0m [93mpH[0m) with [93msubstrate[0m [93mconversions[0m up to [93m58[0m%. [93mSubsequent[0m [93mexperiments[0m with [93mDOPC[0m in [93mlarge[0m [93munilamellar[0m [93mvesicles[0m ([93mLUVs[0m) and in [93msolution[0m [93mincluded[0m a [93mPEGylated[0m ([93mfeaturing[0m [93mincreased[0m [93mwater[0m [93msolubility[0m) and a [93mpalmitoylated[0m (with [93mincreased[0m [93mmembrane[0m [93mmobility[0m) [93mHGII[0m [93mderivative[0m. [93mBoth[0m were [93msuccessfully[0m [93msynthesised[0m [93mbeforehand[0m and [93mcomprehensively[0m [93mcharacterized[0m. [93mMembrane[0m [93mlocalisation[0m of the [93mcatalysts[0m was [93mevaluated[0m [93mvia[0m [93msize[0m [93mexclusion[0m [93mchromatography[0m ([93mSEC[0m) [93mfollowed[0m by [93mICP[0m-[93mMS[0m. [93mProduct[0m [93manalysis[0m of [93mOM[0m was [93mcarried[0m out after [93mone[0m [93mhour[0m and [93m24[0m [93mh[0m, [93mrespectively[0m, [93mvia[0m [93mNMR[0m, [93mTLC[0m, and [93mLC[0m-[93mMS[0m. The [93mintra[0m- and [93mintermolecular[0m [93mOM[0m [93mproducts[0m of [93mDOPC[0m were [93midentified[0m. [93mFirst[0m, [93msubstrate[0m [93mconversion[0m was [93msignificantly[0m [93mdiminished[0m in the [93mvesicles[0m, [93mhowever[0m, the [93mequilibrium[0m [93mstate[0m in [93mvesicles[0m was [93mreached[0m in [93mmuch[0m [93mless[0m [93mtime[0m [93mcompared[0m to [93msolution[0m ([93m1[0m [93mh[0m in [93mvesicles[0m [93mvs[0m. [93m24[0m [93mh[0m in [93msolution[0m). To [93mour[0m [93msurprise[0m, a [93mdistinct[0m [93mdifference[0m in [93mproduct[0m [93mselectivity[0m between [93mOM[0m in [93msolution[0m and in [93mvesicles[0m was [93mobserved[0m in that the [93mintramolecular[0m [93mOM[0m is [93mmuch[0m [93mfavoured[0m in [93msolution[0m, while in [93mLUVs[0m, the [93mmain[0m [93mproducts[0m are the [93mresult[0m of [93mintermolecular[0m [93mOM[0m [93mreactions[0m. [93mOur[0m [93mresults[0m [93mprove[0m that [93mOM[0m is [93mreadily[0m [93mcatalysed[0m in [93mvesicles[0m and [93mindicate[0m that the [93mmilieu[0m of the [93mlipid[0m [93mbilayer[0m [93mhas[0m a [93mmajor[0m [93mimpact[0m on the [93mproduct[0m [93mselectivity[0m, [93mreaction[0m [93mtime[0m and [93msubstrate[0m [93mconversion[0m. While [93mprevious[0m [93mwork[0m [93mhas[0m [93mfocused[0m on the [93mcytotoxicity[0m of [93mHoveyda[0m-[93mGrubbs[0m [93mcatalysts[0m and [93mtheir[0m [93minteraction[0m with [93mbiomolecules[0m, [93mour[0m [93mpresent[0m [93mwork[0m [93mprovides[0m [93mvaluable[0m [93minsights[0m on what [93mwill[0m [93mhappen[0m when an [93mOM[0m [93mcatalyst[0m [93mlike[0m [93mHGII[0m is [93mexposed[0m to [93mmembranes[0m in [93morganisms[0m. [93mMoreover[0m, [93musing[0m the [93mresults[0m from this [93mwork[0m, it [93mmay[0m be [93mpossible[0m to [93mselectively[0m [93mmodify[0m [93mmembrane[0m [93mproperties[0m, and [93mthereby[0m [93mcellular[0m [93mresponsiveness[0m to [93moutside[0m [93mstress[0m, by [93molefin[0m [93mmetathesis[0m in the [93mfuture[0m.
